Plinko_GetMultipliers().details: function to view the current plinko multipliers

returns.multipliers: all multipliers for all rows and risks

Plinko_GetState(address).details: function to get current request player is await from VRF, returns 0 if none

params.player: address of the player to get the state

Plinko_Play(uint256,address,uint8,uint8,.details: Function to play Plinko, takes the user wager saves bet parameters and makes a request to the VRF

params.numBets: number of bets to make, and amount of random numbers to request
params.numRows: number of Rows that plinko will have, range 8-16
params.risk: risk for game, higher risk increases variance, range 0-2
params.stopGain: treshold value at which the bets stop if a certain profit is obtained
params.stopLoss: treshold value at which the bets stop if a certain loss is obtained
params.tokenAddress: address of token to bet, 0 address is considered the native coin

Plinko_Refund().details: Function to refund user in case of VRF request failling

getVRFFee(uint256,uint256).details: calculates in form of native token the fee charged by chainlink VRF

returns.fee: amount of fee user has to pay

setPlinkoMultipliers(uint256[],uint8,uin.details: function to set the plinko multipliers, can only be called by bankroll owner

params.multipliers: array of all multipliers for the selected number of rows and risk
params.numRows: number of rows to set multiplier

transferFees(address).details: function to transfer VRF fees acumulated in the contract to the Bankroll Can only be called by owner

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
